apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the kiss (man, person, light skin tone, dark skin tone) emoji captures a tender moment with a man and another person of contrasting skin tones leaning in for a kiss, a rose petal accentuating the romantic gesture. Apple's design language imbues the figures with soft, rounded features and subtle 3D shading, suggesting warmth and affection. The vibrant, glossy rose petal adds a touch of passionate romance, making this emoji on Apple devices a beautiful way to express love and intimacy.
